page.title: 18Kington :Supernatural
page.content: The best Known legend around Kington is Black Vaughan of Hergest. He was Thomas Vaughan and he lived at Hergest Court. Thomas was killed at The Battle of Banbury in 1469. Kington people were tormented by his ghost. His spirit grew stronger, then he entered St. Mary's church as a Hereford bull. People were afraid of Black Vaughan. The number of people in Kington market dropped. His spirit was reduced more than once. He was put in a snuff box "good and true" with a bell, book and candle. Then it was thrown into Hergest Court moat. The Court is still haunted by a demon dog which used to belong to him. The demon dog was probably used in the novel "Hound of the Baskerville". The Baskervilles owned Eardisley Castle and were related to the Vaughans.
